FuncDef: This command enables DHCP snooping of DHCP messages on the SAP or SDP. Enabling DHCP snooping on VPLS interfaces (SAPs and SDP bindings) is required where DHCP messages important to lease state table population are received, or where Option 82 information is to be inserted. This includes interfaces that are in the path to receive messages from either DHCP servers or from subscribers.
